price: “Utječem se Milostivom od tebe, ako se Njega bojiš!”, uzviknu ona.
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
